text: I don’t think I can create a product all by myself!
suggestion: I will definitely try to create a product all by myself!

text: My friends are better at doing things independently than I am.
suggestion: I am still learning to do things independently and can definitely learn from my friends who are really good at it!

text: I am a self-starter and self-motivated so I think I can do it!
I think I can win the match!
I don’t sing as well as my fellow peer. I am okay but she is great.
suggestion: I like to sing and can definitely get better at it. I am sure I will be able to sing like my peer who is really good at it too.

text: Math is not my strong suit.
suggestion: I can always improve my skills in Math.

text: I am really good at Math.
